FuncDef: This command assigns a pre-configured lag link map profile to a SAP/network interface configured on a LAG or a PW port that exists on a LAG. Once assigned/de-assigned, the SAP s/network interface s egress traffic will be re-hashed over LAG as required by the new configuration.

ParaDef.Info: An integer from 1 to 64 that defines a unique lag link map profile on the LAG the SAP/network interface exists on.
